summary: Save data recommendation before meeting Serana.
descriptionHtml:
Because I am not good at English, this is a machine translation.

I will replace Serrana and Valerica.
It will not be reflected unless it is saved data before encounter.
Summoning magic such as creation of ghosts is deleted, and Destruction magic will be added.

Thanks to the wonderful mod for creating.

Thank you for using misuzu's war make-up.
https://msz-misuzu.jimdo.com/msz-skyrim-mods/warpaints/
